column4: is there a way to change the terminal so only a custom characters appear instead of user@computer:dir$ ?
Yes, you want to set your PS1 variable.
Try playing with PS1="Stuff" in a terminal.  When you get it the way you like, you'll want to add it to the end of ~/.bashrc
Also check 'man bash' to see what special characters you can use.  For example \w is your currect directory, etc.
